question: A painter works for 4 weeks every month and for 6 days every week. If he gets paid €175 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The painter works for 6 days every week and works for 4 weeks every month so he works for 6 days/week * 4 weeks/month = <<6*4=24>>24 days/month
If he earns €175 every day he then earns €175/day * 24 days/month = €<<175*24=4200>>4200/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns €4200/month * 12 months/year = €<<4200*12=50,400>>50,400
#### 50,400
